name: Santa's Workshop (itch) (PaulDemers)
description:
Santa's Workshop is a challenging new puzzle-platformer, offering seven abilities and 25 exciting levels. Once you've mastered them all, you can use the level editor -included for free!- for even more silly snow adventures!

We are including a copy of the Santa's Workshop Level Editor with every purchase. We love spending hours creating extra levels for each other to explore and we hope you will too! We look forward to your feedback and hope to include some of your helpful suggestions in the future versions. Let us know what features of the Santa's Workshop Level Editor you need to create that 'perfect' level!
